FVTT-MII.Interface.Title: MOSH TERMINAL
FVTT-MII.Interface.SelectFile: SELECT A FILE TO VIEW CONTENT
FVTT-MII.Hacking.Help.word-guess: GUESS THE PASSWORD. LIKENESS INDICATES MATCHING CHARACTERS IN CORRECT POSITIONS.
FVTT-MII.Hacking.Help.signal-injection: ALIGN THE SIGNAL WITH THE MOVING TARGET ZONE. ADJUST SLIDER AND CLICK INJECT.
FVTT-MII.Hacking.Help.data-stream: CONNECT THE PIPES FROM START TO END. CLICK TO ROTATE TILES.
FVTT-MII.Hacking.Help.node-overload: FIND ALL SAFE NODES. NUMBERS INDICATE ADJACENT MINES. CLICK TO REVEAL.
FVTT-MII.Hacking.Help.brute-force: TYPE THE CODE BEFORE TIME RUNS OUT.
FVTT-MII.Hacking.Help.pattern-buffer: MEMORIZE THE PATTERN AND REPEAT IT BACK.
FVTT-MII.Settings.ComputerPassword.Name: Computer Password
FVTT-MII.Settings.ComputerPassword.Hint: The password required to access the computer system.
FVTT-MII.Settings.RootFolderName.Name: Root Folder Name
FVTT-MII.Settings.RootFolderName.Hint: The name of the root Journal folder containing terminal data.
FVTT-MII.Settings.InterfaceTitle.Name: Interface Title
FVTT-MII.Settings.InterfaceTitle.Hint: The title displayed on the window header.
FVTT-MII.Settings.OSVersion.Name: OS Version
FVTT-MII.Settings.OSVersion.Hint: The text displayed in the top-left corner of the interface.
FVTT-MII.Settings.ShipActorName.Name: Ship Actor Name
FVTT-MII.Settings.ShipActorName.Hint: The name of the Ship Actor to monitor status for.
FVTT-MII.Settings.EnableAudio.Name: Enable Audio
FVTT-MII.Settings.EnableAudio.Hint: Enable sound effects for the interface.
FVTT-MII.Settings.HackingDifficulty.Name: Hacking Difficulty Multiplier
FVTT-MII.Settings.HackingDifficulty.Hint: Multiplies the player's skill bonus. Lower values make hacking harder, higher values make it easier. (Default: 1.0)
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundStartup.Name: Startup Sound
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundStartup.Hint: Sound played when the interface opens or login succeeds.
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundKeypress.Name: Keypress Sound
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundClick.Name: Click Sound
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundError.Name: Error Sound
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundSuccess.Name: Success Sound
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundSuccess.Hint: Sound played when a hack is successful.
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundFail.Name: Fail Sound
FVTT-MII.Settings.SoundFail.Hint: Sound played when a hack fails.
FVTT-MII.Settings.ActiveController.Name: Active Controller
FVTT-MII.Errors.RootFolderNotFound: MOSH Interface: Root folder '{rootFolderName}' not found in Journals.
FVTT-MII.Notifications.NoMinigamesEnable: No hacking minigames are enabled by the GM.
If checked, the Word Guess minigame can appear during hacking attempts.
FVTT-MII.Settings.EnableGame.signal-inje: If checked, the Signal Injection minigame can appear during hacking attempts.
FVTT-MII.Settings.EnableGame.data-stream: If checked, the Data Stream minigame can appear during hacking attempts.
FVTT-MII.Settings.EnableGame.node-overlo: If checked, the Node Overload minigame can appear during hacking attempts.
FVTT-MII.Settings.EnableGame.brute-force: If checked, the Brute Force minigame can appear during hacking attempts.
FVTT-MII.Settings.EnableGame.pattern-buf: If checked, the Pattern Buffer minigame can appear during hacking attempts.
